events.name: Digital JAM 2.0 Sports Hackathon
events.about:
SPORTSHACKATHON will bring together developers, designers, business/marketing heads with sports experts, sports journalists and authorities to explore how technology can better enabling sports as a social development tool and provide entrepreneurial opportunities for technologically inclined youth.

The Sports Hackathon is on Thursday June 28th, 2012, which is the first of the three day event called Digital JAM- The Future of Work is online. It will be held at Jamaica Conference Centre in Kingston, Jamaica
